page.title: 10A New Estate in Harvington.
page.content: Harvington is an old village with lots of old houses.There are several new estates and a further one has just been completed. My Mum is a sales woman selling the new houses. Charter Homes first opened last year. Before a house is built it has to be planned. You get pieces of wood called pegs and these mark out the houses. The inside takes longer than the outside .I live in one of the houses. They are really nice except when the radiators are cold and not working. There are three types of houses, the Charlecote,Arden and the Marlborough. She has just sold the last one.Last year my class did a project based on the building site at Charter Homes.We visited the houses as they were all being built and we went around the show house. We talked to the builders about their work.It was great fun.
